pkgmetadata.longdescription: |travis|microarch=========Knuth Microarchitecture Management (CPUID)Getting started---------------Stable version:.. code-block:: bash $ pip install --upgrade microarchDevelopment version:.. code-block:: bash $ pip install --upgrade --index-url https://test.pypi.org/pypi/ microarch.. |travis| image:: https://travis-ci.org/k-nuth/microarch.svg?branch=master :target: https://travis-ci.org/k-nuth/microarch
